isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper) With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the right power source socket, power will flow from battery stud (B2) through circuit 14AP, fuse F8-D, circuits 14AX, 14P, fuse K3, and circuit 84B to right power source socket. The ground path is circuit 11H, and 11D to sleeper ground.

If an accessory is plugged into the console power source socket, power will flow from battery stud (B2) through circuit 14AP, fuse F8-D, circuits 14AX, 14P, fuse K4, and circuit 84A to console power source socket. The ground path is circuit 11B to sleeper ground.
